settings.title: SINGLE ORIGIN COFFEE
settings.content: We only sell single-origin coffee because we care deeply about the people and families that work so hard to produce it.. We purposefully only buy from farms that have programs that give back to their local communities. Some of the farmers we buy from provide free health care, for their workers, and families, others provide free education, build schools, roads, or water tanks for their communities. You can find each farms story on the coffee product page.
settings.label: COFFEE

settings.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
settings.content:
At Redemption Road coffee, we view our customers as allies on our journey to making the world a better place.
As Such:
We stand behind our products and quality.
We love to provide you with marketing material that helps you thrive!
We are committed to good communication and fair prices.
settings.label: VIEW ALL

settings.title: BENEFITS OF WHOLESALE
settings.content:
• Fast and easy ordering online
  • We have 0.25, 1, and 5 pound options available
  • Bulk Redemption Pod pricing available
  • Cold Brew cans available
  • Automatic subscritipons
  • Invoicing and terms available
  • Equipment acquision and training
  • Assistance with Routine maintenance of equipment
  • Impacting the world for good
settings.label: VIEW ALL

settings.content: Join us on the journey of making the world a better place. At Redemption Road Coffee, our wholesalers are the backbone that enables us to live out our mission. It is because of coffee shops, churches, bakeries, and hotels like you that sell our coffee that we can help to fund programs that help kids transition out of foster care, or give towards the prohibition of sex slavery, or fund orphanages, and build bridges in Rwanda, Uganda, and other African countries. It is companies like yours that enable us to change the world. If you would like to join us in our journey of making the world a better place, please reach out. We would be honored to talk with you.
